name: Super Sweet Crispy Crunchy Crunch DX (The Final Fight Edition)
name_original: Super Sweet Crispy Crunchy Crunch DX (The Final Fight Edition)
description:
Game made during the LD41 with the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Games". We chose to mix an infiltration and a fighting game!

In Super Sweet Cripsy Crunchy Crunch DX (the Final Fight Edition) you play "Régis" a dog thief who absolutely wants to steal all the Super Sweet Crispy Crunchy Crunch from the food market (it's a dog treat) before its official release.
His initial plan was to sneak into the shop and to rush to the storage, but little did he know that his rival "Jérôme" had the exact same idea ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.

That's when Régis got a genius idea: if he he could push Jérôme into the guards light, he could have some extra time to steal the precious dog treat and in the same time get rid of his lifetime rival "Jérôme".
Have fun!!

-------------------------------------

The controls :
Solo mode :

- arrows to move
- spacebar to push your rival into the light.

Multiplayer mode :

- Player 1 : WASD to move - and - SPACEBAR to hit
- Player 2 : IJKL to move - and - RIGHT SHIFT to hit
